Author: LadyTigerBomb
Text: In my head if I drink water and weigh myself and it goes up a whole pound, I’m mentally destroyed. I get this fear of drinking water or drinking anything. Like I’ll do it sporadically through the day but that’s the best anyone will get out of me.

Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: I had a fear of this because it makes the number on the scale higher, even though logically I know it's not real weight.
